entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010hourly=input_table_1%%00010columns_par=hourly.columns%%00010demand = input_table_2%%00010#print(y_eprod.shape)%%00010demand.set_index(['Years', 'Country'], inplace=True)%%00010demand.sort_index(inplace=True)%%00010%%00010num_list=[8784, 17568, 26352, 35136]%%00010h_val=hourly.values%%00010%%00010h_val_ch=np.divide(h_val[:num_list[0],:], h_val[:num_list[0],:].sum(axis=0))%%00010h_val_dh=np.divide(h_val[num_list[0]:num_list[1],:], h_val[num_list[0]:num_list[1],:].sum(axis=0))%%00010h_val_cc=np.divide(h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:], h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:].sum(axis=0)%%00010, out=np.zeros_like(h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:]), where=h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:].sum(axis=0)!=0.0)%%00010h_val_dc=np.divide(h_val[num_list[2]:,:], h_val[num_list[2]:,:].sum(axis=0)\%%00010, out=np.zeros_like(h_val[num_list[2]:,:]), where=h_val[num_list[2]:,:].sum(axis=0)!=0.0)%%00010%%00010#print(h_val.shape)%%00010#print(demand.info(), demand)%%00010d_val_1=demand['bld_energy-demand_heat_non-residential_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_2=demand['bld_energy-demand_heat_residential_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_3=demand['bld_energy-demand_non-residential_space-cooling_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_4=demand['bld_energy-demand_residential_space-cooling_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010%%00010%%00010#print(d_val.shape, h_val.shape)%%00010%%00010ch_hval=np.multiply(h_val_ch, d_val_1)%%00010#print(ch_hval.shape)%%00010dh_hval=np.multiply(h_val_dh, d_val_2)%%00010#print(dh_hval.shape)%%00010cc_hval=np.multiply(h_val_cc, d_val_3)%%00010#print(cc_hval.shape)%%00010dc_hval=np.multiply(h_val_dc, d_val_4)%%00010#print(dc_hval.shape)%%00010%%00010ch_val=ch_hval+dh_hval+cc_hval+dc_hval%%00010%%00010ch_h=pd.DataFrame(ch_val, columns=columns_par)%%00010output_table=ch_h%%00010%%00010
